algorithm.name: TIKATEXT
algorithm.description: The Apache Tika text detection component.

properties.name: CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: The minimum confidence score which must be met or exceeded. Detections below this threshold are silently discarded.

properties.name: STORE_METADATA
properties.description: Specifies whether or not to store metadata as a separate track detection.

properties.name: LANGUAGE_DETECTOR
properties.description: Specifies which Tika language detector to use. Current options are `opennlp` and `optimaize`. Please note, if `opennlp` is selected, ensure that the `MIN_LANGUAGES` property is set to 1 or greater.

properties.name: FILTER_REASONABLE_LANGUAGES
properties.description: If enabled, ignore language detections that are not marked as reasonable. Disable to attempt language detection for short sentences, especially with the OpenNLP language detector.

properties.name: LIST_ALL_PAGES
properties.description: Specifies whether or not to store each page as a track, even if no text is extracted.

properties.name: MIN_CHARS_FOR_LANGUAGE_DETECTION
properties.description: Specifies minimum length of detected text before language filtering is applied.

properties.name: FEED_FORWARD_PROP_TO_PROCESS
properties.description: Comma-separated list of property names indicating which properties in the feed-forward track or detection to consider translating. If the first property listed is present, then that property will be translated. If it's not, then the next property in the list is considered. At most, one property will be translated.

properties.name: LANGUAGE_ID_ONLY
properties.description: For generic media: If set to true, this component will only perform language identification on feed-forward track output and will ignore the associated media.

actions.name: TIKA TEXT DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Executes the Tika text detection algorithm using the default parameters.

actions.name: TIKA TEXT DETECTION SOURCE MEDIA ONLY ACTION
actions.description: Executes the Tika text detection algorithm using the default parameters on source media only, no derivatives.

tasks.name: TIKA TEXT DETECTION SOURCE MEDIA ONLY TASK
tasks.description: Performs Tika text detection on source media only, no derivatives.
actions: TIKA TEXT DETECTION SOURCE MEDIA ONLY ACTION

pipelines.name: TIKA TEXT DETECTION WITH KEYWORD TAGGING PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs Tika text detection and keyword tagging.
